title: [1508521049] 5 Electronic Shifting Hacks For Cyclists | Maintenance Monday
description:
Are you getting the most out of your ⚡️ electronic gear shifting?⚡️ Si has compiled his 5 top hacks for Shimano and Sram electronic gears to help you get that pro shift. 

Subscribe to GCN: http://gcn.eu/SubscribeToGCN
Register your interest in the GCN Club: http://gcn.eu/n5
Get exclusive GCN gear in the GCN shop! http://gcn.eu/n6

From adjusting the shifting to perfection to hidden functionality and handy tricks, there's more to electronic shifting than meets the eye. Did you know about all of these tricks?

Here's a summary of Simon Richardson's top 5 hacks;

1. ANT+ Connectivity - head unit for gearing or battery life indicator
2. Hidden buttons - additional shift buttons or screen scroll
3. Remove Batteries before travel
4. Micro adjust 
5. Tidy cables 

Do you have any electronic gearing hacks that we've missed? Let us know in the comments ⚡️

If you'd like to contribute captions and video info in your language, here's the link

About GCN:

The Global Cycling Network puts you in the centre of the action: from the iconic climbs of Alpe D’Huez and Mont Ventoux to the cobbles of Flanders, everywhere there is road or pavé, world-class racing and pro riders, we will be there bringing you action, analysis and unparalleled access every week, every month, and every year. We show you how to be a better cyclist with our bike maintenance videos, tips for improving your cycling, cycling top tens, and not forgetting the weekly GCN Show. Join us on YouTube’s biggest and best cycling channel to get closer to the action and improve your riding!

Welcome to the Global Cycling Network | Inside cycling
